resources.string: Welcome to the Guide for the app \"RISK - probability calculator\"
For RISK-rules, please have a look at the rulebook, delivered with the game.

Important for the usage of the app is the knowledge of how a war - the principle concept of this game - works. Within a war, one player is attacking the field of another player. The RISK rules state that the attacker can attack with at most three dices whereby the defender can defend his field with at most two dices. A so-called dice-war ends after each time the dices were thrown by both the attacker and the defender. Each time when dices were thrown, the probabilities of the attacker or defender winning are updated.
Enter the attacking and the defending units for units located on the fields which are going to be attacked.

At the beginning, the attacking units and the defending units for at least one field must be entered. If the units exceed 75, they will be automatically reset to 75 - entering numbers bigger than 75 is not possible.
After all units are entered, please press \"Calculate\"
For each defending field entered within the step before, a line with the following values is displayed:
Number of attacker, number of defender, number of expected remaining attackers, number of expected remaining defenders, probability that attacker wins, probability that defender wins
Note: If the winning probabilities are distributed as of 100% and 0%, the 0% does not implicate no chance of winning but the probability is too little and therefore is rounded to 0%.
By pressing a line, the attacker chooses which units are going to be attacked and a new window will be opened.
On top are the same values as before in the list, but now only for the chosen field.
Depending on current attacker and defender are multiple buttons shown.
The two buttons on the left side, are pressed if the attacker lost one or two units.
The two buttons on the right side are pressed if the defender lost one or two units.
The button in the middle is pressed if both sides lost one unit.
After each button-press, the values above will be updated. Press a button each time, a dice-war has ended
Enter at least for field 1 numbers of attacking and defending Units
Please enter at least units for one defender-field
Input is required to be smaller than 76 - input will be set to 75 automatically
